name: Moss Man Loses His Dough During A Machine Invasion
name_original: Moss Man Loses His Dough During A Machine Invasion
description: You play as moss man, who has quite sadly lost all of his bread dough during the machine apocalypse. Moss man just wants to get his dough back but the machines think he is trying to stop them! Can you get the big doughs back? (oh and press alt+f4 to exit the game)
